result.execSummary:
The defendant Joshua J. REED was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Bail Jumping-Felony, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Consecutive to the straight jail sentences presently being served on 16 CF 45, 15 CF 480, 15 CF 444 and 15 CF 271.

BAIL HEARING -

Defendant's Notice of Alibi.

ADDRESS INFO for Joshua J. REED
Current: 515 N. 6th Street, Sheboygan, WI 53081 United States  (Effective: 04-10-2015)
Prior: 815 Jay Street #A, Manitowoc, WI 54220 United States

The State files an Amended Information which amends the charge in count 1 to misdemeanor bail jumping, contrary to Section 946.49(1)(a) of the Wisconsin Statutes.
NO CONTEST plea entered to the amended charge in count 1.  Convicted.
The State moves to dismiss and read in count 2.  Motion granted.
During a colloquy between the defendant and the court, the defendant stated that he did not take anything from the victim in this matter.   The Court cannot take the defendant's plea to a bail jumping charge if he is denying the charge that substantiated the bail jumping.
The Court orders that the conviction in count 1 and the dismissal of count 2 be vacated.  The Court deems the defendant's plea to count 1 withdrawn.  The Court will set this matter for trial.
The State withdraws the Amended Information.
Pretrial conference is set for 06-05-15 at 11:00 a.m.
Jury trial is set for 06-09-15 at 8:30 a.m. no: 2 position. 
Reminder notices given.

It is hereby ordered that based upon the facts presented to the court the bond is modified to allow Joshua Reed to move to the Sheboygan County and the daily reporting condition is suspended.
